appsgate.lig.luminosity.sensor.spec
Interface LuminositySensorSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
LuminositySensorImpl
public interface LuminositySensorSpec

This java interface is an ApAM specification shared by all ApAM Appsgate application to handle illumination variation from sensors.

Since:
February 5, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
